title: Super Bowl - monetary compensation for players playing in the game 2011 to 2020
summary: You are viewing a chart of multi-line type with 2 lines denoting Winning team, and Loosing team. The y axis indicates the Pay in thousand U.S. dollars and the x axis indicates Year.
Overall Winning team, and Loosing team are gradually increasing,  throughout the Year
The ranking of the lines from topmost to botommmost is as follows: 1. Winning team, and lastly, 2. Loosing team.
Overall across the Year, Winning team mostly maintained the highest Pay in thousand U.S. dollars when compared to others with a mean value of 105.8, and it peaked at 2020.
Loosing team mostly had the least Pay in thousand U.S. dollars with a mean value of 52.9, which peaked at 2020 with a value of 65.0.
